Welcome to Airos! Say goodbye to limits,: Welcome to Airos! Say goodbye to limits, ugly interfaces and bugs. Experience a seamless transition to a world of limitless possibilities with Airos.

You are currently using the beta version: You are currently using the beta version of Airos. This is associated with a large number of bugs and system instability. Currently, no stable version of the system has been released. When we release the stable release, you will need to download an update package approximately ~2GB in size. We do not currently recommend using this system on your main computer.
